mapper.select:
select count(1) from copartner_area_info where 1=1
and copartner_area_name like concat('%',#{copartnerAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and copartner_area_company like concat('%',#{copartnerAreaCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and copartner_area_level = #{copartnerAreaLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select copartner_area_id as copartnerAreaId, copartner_area_name as copartnerAreaName from copartner_area_info where 1=1 and copartner_area_level = 1 order by copartner_area_name
mapper.insert:
insert into copartner_area_info( copartner_area_id, copartner_area_name,
copartner_area_level,
copartner_area_company, company_person_id, company_person_name, copartner_area_id_up, copartner_area_name_up, create_by, memo ) values( #{copartnerAreaId}, #{copartnerAreaName},
#{copartnerAreaLevel},
#{copartnerAreaCompany}, #{companyPersonId}, #{companyPersonName}, #{copartnerAreaIdUp}, #{copartnerAreaNameUp}, #{createBy}, #{memo} )
mapper.select: select id as id, copartner_area_id as copartnerAreaId, copartner_area_name as copartnerAreaName, copartner_area_level as copartnerAreaLevel, copartner_area_company as copartnerAreaCompany, company_person_id as companyPersonId, company_person_name as companyPersonName, copartner_area_id_up as copartnerAreaIdUp, copartner_area_name_up as copartnerAreaNameUp, create_by as createBy, update_by as updateBy, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, memo as memo from copartner_area_info where copartner_area_id = #{copartnerAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.update: update copartner_area_info set copartner_area_id_up =#{copartnerAreaIdUpNew},copartner_area_name_up=#{copartnerAreaNameUpNew} where copartner_area_id_up = #{copartnerAreaIdUpOld}
mapper.select: SELECT copartner_area_id AS copartnerAreaId, copartner_area_name AS copartnerAreaName FROM copartner_area_info WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY copartner_area_id,copartner_area_name
